title: Bandbox, ca. 1830
medium: Block-printed on handmade paper, pasteboard support
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Farm scene with poultry. Printed in pink, olive and white on green field. On top, castle on mountain rising from lake.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bandbox, ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Block-printed on handmade paper, pasteboard support. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1913-17-19-a,b.
